definition: classifier for gifts, newspaper, magazine, papers, reports, contracts etc/variant of 分[fen4]

sentences.english: The school will enroll new students in August.
sentences.chinese: 這所學校將於八月份招收新生。

sentences.english: An outside review of the Geodon data from an auditor won't be complete until August.
sentences.chinese: Geodon數據的外部審查要到八月份才能完成。

sentences.english: Thermostats will rise during the month of August.
sentences.chinese: 聯合國大廈在八月份的室溫將會調高。

sentences.english: The Blakes went to the seaside in August.
sentences.chinese: 布來克一家八月份去海邊了。

sentences.english: So far, six deaths have occurred at the high school level this August alone.
sentences.chinese: 目前，僅八月份，高中就已發生6例死亡案例。

sentences.english: Fabulous Asia Pacific Foods are on sale in the PTU supermarkets from August 2010.
sentences.chinese: 八月份開始於本會超市有售，歡迎選購。

sentences.english: Michael Jackson would have celebrated his fifty-first birthday in August.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾傑克遜本可以在八月份慶祝他的51歲生日。

sentences.english: The boarding music for August is now available for download in Flight Crew World Wide Web .
sentences.chinese: 八月份登機音樂已更新，請至飛航人員資訊網內下載。

sentences.english: The company publishes its accounts in August.
sentences.chinese: 這家商行公佈了八月份的賬目。

sentences.english: At first sight, the economy hit the August turmoil in fine fettle .
sentences.chinese: 起初看來，被八月份的混亂所衝擊的經濟狀況還不錯。

sentences.english: Both phones will be available in Russia and South East Asia starting in August.
sentences.chinese: 這兩部手機將從八月份開始在俄羅斯和東南亞上市。

sentences.english: He was chosen by President Obama for the ambassador post and was confirmed by the Senate in August.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培是由奧巴馬任命的，議會在八月份批准該任命。

sentences.english: Janice wants to get married in August.
sentences.chinese: 婕妮斯想要八月份結婚。

sentences.english: The research appears in the August issue of the journal Ecology. [Emily Dangremond, Eleanor Pardini and Tiffany Knight, http://bit.ly/9yaeIK]
sentences.chinese: 這項研究被刊登於《生態學》期刊八月份大事記中。

sentences.english: The August figure will be published on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 八月份的數據將在星期五公佈。

sentences.english: When does Janice want to get married?
sentences.chinese: 婕妮斯想要八月份結婚。
